about_the_game:
You’re 19 years old and studying for a degree in physical education.

This is your second year of college, and you’ve transferred to Tsukuba University, staying in the guest room of your young and attractive (and passionate!) aunt, Sakura.

You remember how in Tokyo, you missed the chance to sleep with Miyu, a gym girl famous for her insatiable sexual appetite… but now, you’ve bumped into her again in Tsukuba!

Could this be your chance to explore possibilities with both Sakura and Miyu?

And Tsukuba has even more fascinating women! There’s Hana, the student-teacher; Aiko, the university’s cleaning staff; and Yumi, the distance learner.

You won’t settle for just one. You know that. But… will you let each one know about the others, or live in a world of secrets?

Let’s get to know them a bit better.

♥ Sakura, 29 years old, is tender, smells divine, and is pure fire.

Your relationship feels maternal at first, but when night falls and she returns from work, and you from university… everything changes!

♥ Miyu, 26 years old, is mysterious, seductive, and playful. She’s also a perfect athlete with an insatiable sexual appetite.

You may not know exactly what she wants from you… but deep down, you’re sure her biggest craving is your cock.

♥ Hana, 24 years old, is a clumsy student-teacher, nervous about her first teaching experience.

But it’s only her first time as a teacher: her shyness vanishes in bed (or on the faculty room desk!) when your cock is nearby.

♥ Aiko, 18 years old, is serious and professional. She maintains an impeccable facade, as she’s one of the university’s cleaning staff.

Rumor has it that during her night shifts, she cleans the entire campus completely naked, hoping to be watched.

♥ Yumi, 19 years old, is extremely shy and avoids physical contact or eye contact.

But she keeps insisting you visit her home. And you know what that means: To her room. To her bed. Under the sheets. Without clothes.

  • Visual novel format: Each girl has her own story.

  • Choose the story: The story has different variations.

  • Hidden Endings: Discover the hidden endings of the game based on the choices you make.

  • Uncensored!: We have removed the censorship from the images (an option to censor them as you like will be added later).

  • Flashback: Go back in the story at any time if you want to change a decision or relive a moment.

  • Comfortable navigation: Choose whether the text advances automatically or skip it to get to your favorite part.

  • Immersive audio: Including music, sound, voices, and "other effects". Adjust the volume independently as you like or mute everything.

PLEASE NOTE.

  • All characters depicted and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no real or identifiable minors have been used in the production of this game.

  • Give us a hand! If you think you can improve the narrative in your language, feel free to send us your suggestions to our mail or by message on our Steam page.

  • We are still working: all the improvements and new features we develop will be added to the game at no additional cost.
